Description: On I-81 at mile marker 236.4 in the County of Augusta, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-1 in the County of Caroline, in the vicinity of C.C.C. Rd; Jefferson Davis Hwy, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 143.6 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
